flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 18 valentine's cards because 30 x 0.6 = <<30*0.6=18>>18
He will spend $36 on these because 18 x 2 = <<18*2=36>>36
The proportion of his income spent is 0.09 because 36 / 40 = <<36/40=0.09>>0.09
This is 9% of his income because 0.09 x 100 = <<0.09*100=9>>9
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.9, not 0.09. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
